channel.title: Homes on System INtelligence Group (지능시스템 연구실)
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on System INtelligence Group (지능시스템 연구실)

item.description: Biography Seung Jun Baek is a full professor of Computer Science and Engineering at Korea University. Prof. Baek received Ph.D. and M.S. degrees at University of Texas at Austin, and B.S. degree at Seoul National University, all in Electrical and Computer Engineering. He was a Member Technical Staff of DSP Systems R&D center, Communication and Medical Systems Lab. of Texas Instruments. He next joined Korea University: as of 2018, is a professor at Computer Science and Engr.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: The following is a list of course I have taught. For the materials, please refer to BlackBoard page at Korea University. Fall 2018 COSE380: Digital Signal Processing COSE342: Computer Networks Spring 2018 COSE221 : Digital Logic Design Fall 2017 CRE793: Convex Optimization (Graduate level) COSE342: Computer Networks Spring 2017 COSE221 : Digital Logic Design Fall 2016 COSE380: Digital Signal Processing COSE342: Computer Networks
